text: - I really had no technical experience.
- Being able to have the opportunity
to make this career transition has been

- I went from working in
customer service for 20 years

to the possibility of being
a cloud developer.
- They give tons of hands-on experience.
You're learning from AWS pros themselves.
- The instructors are super helpful and,

It's a very great and
supportive atmosphere.

- AWS Cloud Institute has
helped me gain the deep

understanding of the
foundations of the cloud.
- I now have the confidence to understand
that I do belong in this industry.
- I feel like I have a new path ahead
and that I can kind of choose right now,
